segments.text: I see a woman standing by the sink, completely absorbed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't noticed the water overflowing and creating a puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why she's so focused on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the edge, and she doesn't even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calm she is, given the mess that's forming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she might be in some sort of trance, oblivious to her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, and she has no clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off that faucet soon before the whole kitchen floods.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's in her own little world, completely unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like shouting at her to wake up and notice what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
